content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1562689558092{margin-right: 100px !important;margin-left: 100px !important;}”]

Use the “Book Online” button below to reserve your appointment with
Sugaring NYC.

It takes fewer than two minutes! Choose your service, see available time
slots and finish your booking with your contact information. You will
receive a confirmation email and text message once your reservation is
complete.

You can modify your reservation up to 24 hours before the start of your
appointment using the link in your confirmation email or give us a call
at  1-888-647-8427

new timelyButton(“sugaringnycllc”, {“imgSrc”:”https://www.sugaringnyc.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/bookBTN-red.png”});

 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
